description: TO ELECT A SPEAKER OF THE HOUSE FOR THE 59TH CONGRESS. VOTES FOR J. G. CANNON (R) ARE CODED "2", AND VOTES FOR J. S. WILLIAMS (D) ARE CODED "1".
Issue1: Election of the Speaker of the House
